name: Eternal Link
description:
Eternal Link is a Side-scroller game where the player must find someone in a mysterious cave.

The main character is Toll, a 13 year old boy. He looks sad and serious but he is brave and determined to save his little brother, the only family member he has left.

He will be helped by a mysterious object, the Oracle, which will give him powers to confront evil entities and discover things he does not know...

This Itch.io file is not a game nor a demo but a Game Design Document.
